menu.name: Paneer Butter Masala with Rice
menu.description: A student favorite! Soft paneer in creamy tomato gravy served with steamed rice.

menu.name: Egg Curry with Roti
menu.description: Boiled eggs cooked in spicy curry, served with soft rotis.

menu.name: Masala Dosa
menu.description: Crispy dosa stuffed with spicy potato filling, served with chutney and sambar.

menu.name: Veg Pulao
menu.description: Aromatic rice cooked with fresh vegetables and mild spices, served with raita.

menu.name: Chole Bhature
menu.description: Spicy chickpea curry served with fluffy bhature, a filling meal for students!

menu.name: Dal Tadka with Jeera Rice
menu.description: Yellow lentils tempered with garlic and cumin, served with jeera rice for a light meal.

menu.name: Pav Bhaji
menu.description: Mumbai-style mashed veggie curry served with buttery pav buns, a quick and tasty option.

menu.name: Maggie Noodles
menu.description: Quick and delicious instant noodles, a favorite among students!

menu.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
menu.description: Crispy bread filled with melted cheese, perfect for a quick bite.
